datasets.name: 16afdf32
datasets.query:
WITH pricing AS (
  select
    pricing.effective_list.default as price,
    price_start_time,
    sku_name,
    COALESCE(price_end_time, NOW()) as price_end_time
  from
    system.billing.list_prices p
),
endpoint_data AS (
  SELECT
    usage_quantity * price as cost,
    --endpoint_name field was added in June 2024, previously it was null
    IF(
      usage_metadata.endpoint_name IS NULL,
      'not populated',
      usage_metadata.endpoint_name
    ) AS endpoint_name,
    u.usage_quantity,
    u.usage_start_time,
    u.usage_date,
    u.usage_type,
    CASE
      WHEN u.usage_type = 'TOKEN' THEN 'PAY_PER_TOKEN'
      WHEN product_features ['serving_type'] = 'MODEL' THEN 'CPU_MODEL'
      ELSE product_features ['serving_type']
    END AS serving_type,
    u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags,
    u.workspace_id,
    u.usage_metadata,
    u.billing_origin_product
  FROM
    system.billing.usage u
    INNER JOIN pricing p ON p.sku_name = u.sku_name
    AND u.usage_start_time BETWEEN p.price_start_time AND p.price_end_time
    AND if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id)
  WHERE
    u.billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING'
    AND usage_date BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  endpoint_data
WHERE
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  )

datasets.name: 6bc00bf9
datasets.query:
with pricing as 
  (select pricing.effective_list.default as price, price_start_time, sku_name, coalesce(price_end_time, now()) as price_end_time  from system.billing.list_prices p),
endpoint_ids AS (
  SELECT
    GET_JSON_OBJECT(response.result, '$.id') AS id,
    GET_JSON_OBJECT(response.result, '$.name') AS name,
    user_identity.email as email
  FROM
    system.access.audit
  WHERE
    action_name = 'createServingEndpoint'
)
SELECT
    sum(usage_quantity) AS DBU, 
    sum(dollar) as dollar,
    endpoint_name,
    first(email) as email,
    first(workspace_id) as workspace_id
  FROM
  (select *, price*usage_quantity as dollar, usage_metadata.endpoint_name as endpoint_name, u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags from `system`.billing.usage u
    inner join pricing p on p.sku_name = u.sku_name and u.usage_start_time between p.price_start_time and p.price_end_time
    LEFT JOIN endpoint_ids e ON e.id = u.custom_tags.EndpointId
    WHERE billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING' 
          and if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id) 
          and u.usage_date > :start_day
  )
  WHERE
  --Apply tag filters.
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  ) 
  GROUP BY endpoint_name
  order by dollar desc

datasets.name: e0b182aa
datasets.query:
WITH pricing AS (
  SELECT
    pricing.effective_list.default AS price,
    price_start_time,
    sku_name,
    COALESCE(price_end_time, NOW()) AS price_end_time
  FROM
    system.billing.list_prices p
),
filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    --endpoint_name field was added in June 2024, previously it was null
    usage_metadata.endpoint_name AS endpoint_name,
    u.usage_quantity,
    price,
    u.workspace_id,
    DATE_FORMAT(usage_date, 'yyyy-MM') AS formatted_date,
    u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags
  FROM
    system.billing.usage u
    INNER JOIN pricing p ON p.sku_name = u.sku_name
    AND u.usage_start_time BETWEEN p.price_start_time
    AND p.price_end_time
  WHERE
    u.billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING'
    AND usage_type = "TOKEN"
    AND usage_date BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date
    AND IF(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', TRUE, workspace_id = :workspace_id)
),
ppt_endpoint_data AS (
  SELECT
    endpoint_name,
    SUM(usage_quantity * price) AS total_dollar,
    formatted_date,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
      PARTITION BY formatted_date
      ORDER BY
        SUM(usage_quantity * price) DESC
    ) AS RN
  FROM
    filtered_data
  --Apply tag filters
  WHERE
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  )
  GROUP BY
    endpoint_name,
    formatted_date
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  ppt_endpoint_data WHERE RN < 11

datasets.name: 64882be7
datasets.query:
WITH pricing AS (
  SELECT
    pricing.effective_list.default AS price,
    price_start_time,
    sku_name,
    COALESCE(price_end_time, NOW()) AS price_end_time
  FROM
    system.billing.list_prices p
),
filtered_data AS (
  SELECT --endpoint_name field was added in June 2024, previously it was null
    usage_metadata.endpoint_name AS endpoint_name,
    u.usage_quantity,
    price,
    u.workspace_id,
    DATE_FORMAT(usage_date, 'yyyy-MM') AS formatted_date,
    u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags
  FROM
    system.billing.usage u
    INNER JOIN pricing p 
    ON p.sku_name = u.sku_name
    AND u.usage_start_time BETWEEN p.price_start_time AND p.price_end_time
    AND if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id)
  WHERE
    u.billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING'
    AND usage_metadata.endpoint_name IS NOT NULL
    AND usage_date BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date
),
endpoint_data AS (
  SELECT
    endpoint_name AS endpoint_name,
    SUM(usage_quantity * price) AS cost,
    formatted_date,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
      PARTITION BY formatted_date
      ORDER BY
        SUM(usage_quantity * price) DESC
    ) AS RN
  FROM
    filtered_data
  --Apply tag filters
  WHERE
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  )
  GROUP BY
    endpoint_name,
    formatted_date
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  endpoint_data
  WHERE RN < 11

datasets.name: b7f9af13
datasets.query:
with pricing as 
  (select pricing.effective_list.default as price, price_start_time, sku_name, coalesce(price_end_time, now()) as price_end_time  from system.billing.list_prices p),
ranked_usage AS (
  SELECT
    sum(usage_quantity) AS DBU, 
    sum(dollar) as dollar,
    usage_date,
    endpoint_name,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY usage_date ORDER BY sum(usage_quantity) DESC) AS rank
  FROM
  (select *, price*usage_quantity as dollar, usage_metadata.endpoint_name as endpoint_name, u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags from `system`.billing.usage u
    inner join pricing p on p.sku_name = u.sku_name and u.usage_start_time between p.price_start_time and p.price_end_time
    WHERE billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING' and if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id) and u.usage_date between :param_start_date and :param_end_date
  )
  WHERE
    --Apply tag filters.
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  ) 
  GROUP BY usage_date, endpoint_name
)
select * from (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN rank <= 10 THEN endpoint_name ELSE 'OTHER' END AS endpoint_name,
    usage_date,
    sum(DBU) AS DBU,
    sum(dollar) AS dollar
  FROM ranked_usage
  GROUP BY usage_date, CASE WHEN rank <= 10 THEN endpoint_name ELSE 'OTHER' END
  ) 
ORDER BY usage_date, DBU DESC

datasets.name: fc1ecaa6
datasets.query:
with pricing as 
  (select pricing.effective_list.default as price, price_start_time, sku_name, coalesce(price_end_time, now()) as price_end_time  from system.billing.list_prices p)
SELECT
    sum(usage_quantity) AS DBU, 
    sum(dollar) as dollar,
    email
  FROM
  (select *, price*usage_quantity as dollar, identity_metadata.run_as as email, u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags
    from 
    `system`.billing.usage u INNER JOIN pricing p on p.sku_name = u.sku_name and u.usage_start_time between p.price_start_time and p.price_end_time
    WHERE billing_origin_product = 'FOUNDATION_MODEL_TRAINING' 
          and if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id) 
          and u.usage_date > :start_day
  )
  WHERE
  --Apply tag filters.
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  )
  GROUP BY email
  order by dollar desc

datasets.name: a589bd23
datasets.query:
with pricing as 
  (select pricing.effective_list.default as price, price_start_time, sku_name, coalesce(price_end_time, now()) as price_end_time  from system.billing.list_prices p),
ranked_usage AS (
  SELECT
    sum(usage_quantity) AS DBU, 
    sum(dollar) as dollar,
    usage_date,
    email,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY usage_date ORDER BY sum(usage_quantity) DESC) AS rank
  FROM
  (select *, price*usage_quantity as dollar, identity_metadata.run_as as email, u.custom_tags,
    TRANSFORM(
      MAP_KEYS(u.custom_tags),
      (k, i) -> CONCAT(k, '=', MAP_VALUES(custom_tags) [i])
    ) AS key_value_tags from `system`.billing.usage u
    inner join pricing p on p.sku_name = u.sku_name and u.usage_start_time between p.price_start_time and p.price_end_time
    WHERE billing_origin_product = 'FOUNDATION_MODEL_TRAINING' and if(:workspace_id='<ALL WORKSPACES>', true, workspace_id = :workspace_id) and u.usage_date between :param_start_date and :param_end_date
  )
  WHERE
    --Apply tag filters.
  (
    :tags = "include all tags"
    OR ARRAY_CONTAINS(key_value_tags, :tags)
    OR MAP_CONTAINS_KEY(custom_tags, :tags)
  ) 
  GROUP BY usage_date, email
)
select * from (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN rank <= 10 THEN email ELSE 'OTHER' END AS email,
    usage_date,
    sum(DBU) AS DBU,
    sum(dollar) AS dollar
  FROM ranked_usage
  GROUP BY usage_date, CASE WHEN rank <= 10 THEN email ELSE 'OTHER' END
  ) 
ORDER BY usage_date, DBU DESC

frame.title: Endpoint Name(s):
frame.description: Endpoint name was added to usage table in June 2024. Prior endpoints will show up as "not populated".

widget.name: a7c238f5
widget.textbox_spec:
# [dbdemos] - Databricks Model Serving Endpoint Cost Attribution Dashboard

This dashboard gives you an overview of your cost for Model Serving Endpoint, and allow you to analyze your current spend. It's using Databricks System table to display price list as $.

*This dashboard is provided for demo/educational purpose, as part of dbdemos, please review the [License](https://github.com/databricks-demos/dbdemos/blob/main/LICENSE) and [Notice](https://github.com/databricks-demos/dbdemos/blob/main/NOTICE) for more details. Please open a github issue for any feedback!*

frame.title: Daily Consumption per model serving type
frame.description: Databricks Units (DBUs) for the endpoints selected.

frame.title: Proportion of Model Serving Costs by Endpoint Type
Tag Key:
frame.description: You can select a key (example: "CostCenter") or a specific key/value pair (example: "CostCenter=DataScience").

frame.title: Last 7 Days Top Endpoint consumption
frame.description: Ignores date parameters - emails are null if EP are created in another region (will be improved)

frame.title: LLM Fine tuning - last 7 days spend
LLM Fine tuning spend per email
